Essay: Plasmmer's Shames and Hits
=
Hits of Plasmmer:
- Protestter, 2011
- Pidgin "fork" Plasma Talk, 2011 (NOT LAUNCHED - will be part of Communic)
- FireCat, 2011 (NOT LAUNCHED - will be Plasmozilla Firefloflis, part of Internet Cat)
- PEHTML, 2012
- PR, 2012
- Peeper, 2012 (crl gn√ßl, ngl crr, wllms)
- Plasmmer TV, 2013 (NOT LAUNCHED - will be NeTVision)
- Peeper, 2014 (amnd mrtns, mts lndm, rbcc)
- Phonemon game builds, 2015
- Plasmmer Open-Source, 2016
- Plasmmer Store at Mercado Livre, 2017
- Communicator messenger ICO, 2018
- FrameworkJS, 2018
- USV video format, 2019
- CommonDesign, 2020
=
Shames of Plasmmer:
- Custom social network, 2011 (an? al)
- Peeper, 2017 (fork, ZN)

CIDs+dscs:
- Chats
- QuickMemo+
- tasks
- notifs
- Blue Ants scripts
- Social archives
=
IPFS (only CIDs) > DM site

- cyano+material > FMWK
- DANIMESQ proj. pages

YN
- Verify if dependencies are installed
- Compile/install dependencies
- younet and yn commands

- fs Updater

- JB

Floflis Packager
- Install jq
- Install as system tool instead of run locally
- Ask which name to package
- Ask to also install UniStore
- Package node_modules folder
- .apps
- .dapp
- .game
- .font
- Gx as package manager

UniStore
- apps/game/dapp/font install {name}.ext
- Then: npm link && npm install -g (except when font)
- Can also install from Dat address
- Can install from IPFS address
- To do: install with just uni, recognizing extension
- To do: app list in OrbitDB
- Install with -folder flag

- qhash app

Dependences: qhash+gitty+Cmmnachn+Omni+CommonBytes

Omni
- Use CmmnChn cnsnss
- FireBase/GC, AWS, IPFS, Swrm, Arweave, IPNS, Dt, Z, Swrm, LBRY, Viewly, BTFS/torrent, Sia, Storj, git obj (exact, part of or related)
- knw in which BCs a tkn is already deployed (for atomic swaps - understand BTC/tBTC, UTN/UTN-P, ChainSafeth, Polkadot, Cosmos, L2, JellySwap, OVM, etc)

Eventoj
- Remove examples
- About (version, libs, FMWK version, license)
- New blank project
- Side panel with project info
- Text edit
- Project draft on temp folder
- Autosave every 15 seconds
- Settings page
- Settings: autosave
- Save
- Save as...
- To do: default program
- Menu: open project
- Read project's JSON info
- Message: this project is already openned
- To do: read by dragging
- New FMWK: Multiple tabs
- List addons
- Event sheet
- Write sh

FMWK layers:
- Brain (plain, tabless HTML)
- Body (responsive, inherit design - same as Hugo bootstrap)
- Skin (OS-theme or site-theme)
- Tint (user personalization, like Twitter color)

Common Design
- Inspire on MetaMask Mobile but better intuitiveness
- Side-develop Common Design + X-UI
- Flat, material or gradient
- Flat or vibrant folder/file icons

FMWK r3
- Hugo repo
- Hugo boilerplate
- MkDocs repo
- MkDocs boilerplate
- Monetization: Anti-Adblock, Carbon, OpenCollective/Gitcoin, Brave, JCE Mining
- Beaker browser app elements
- ZN site elements
- Support Construct 2 game engine
- FMWK omni: <zeronet> or <zn>, <clearnet> or <www>, <dat> or <beaker>, <ipfs>, <swarm>, <solid>, <tor> or <onion>, <i2p>, <gnunet> or <gnu>, <freenet>, <ssb>
- Support MetaMask and IPFS Companion
- Show adblock message, reference Brave browser, offer Basic Attention Token extensions
- Alongside MetaMask, support Frame. - Show message when no required extensions are installed
- OmniLink popunder: this site is securely available on those networks
- OmniLink popunder: this site is available as .dapp
- Dat clone, alongside ZN clone
- Support GoHugo
- FMWK executable (on other platforms, requires JB)
- load common components, also from other sites
- App about menu (create yours or load from template, modify)
- i18n
- Mithrill
- Framlr
- Elements from MkMaterial
- Divide script functions into feature files (feature vs. security updates)
- Move some information to Common Design

- Zoca
